front.title: Data Transmission Over Out-of-Band Alternative Tranports for AFS-3

abstract.t: This document describes an extension to AFS-3 which allows data transfer over arbitrary alternative transports to the traditional Rx RPC over UDP, and describes a method of using TCP as one such alternative transport. This document describes new wire structures and Rx RPCs for the 'afsint' protocol in AFS-3. Internet Draft Comments Comments regarding this draft are solicited. Please include the AFS-3 protocol standardization mailing list (afs3-standardization@openafs.org) as a recipient of any comments.
